description: This is the CloudTrail event generated when you request a password recovery.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The password recovery process could be manipulated or exploited to gain access to credentials, especially if the attacker can intercept or redirect the recovery process.

incidents.description: Disclosure of Security Incidents on imToken

securityImplications: Attackers might start a password recovery process to steal AWS access if they have compromised the email of the user.
